name: Two
code:
from playwright.async_api import async_playwright
import asyncio
import random
import string

async def run():
    async with async_playwright() as p:
        browser = await p.chromium.launch(headless=False)
        page = await browser.new_page()

        # Step 1: Go to the website
        await page.goto("https://sunny-staging.vercel.app/")

        # Step 2: Click the "Sign Up" button at the header
        await page.get_by_role("link", name="Sign Up").click()

        # Step 3: Fill out the signup form
        # Generate random 10 character string for email
        random_string = ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_lowercase + string.digits, k=10))
        email = f"test+{random_string}@example.com"
        
        await page.fill("input[name='fullName']", "Test User")
        await page.fill("input[name='email']", email)

        # Step 4: Submit the form by clicking the "Sign Up" button
        await page.get_by_role("button", name="Sign Up").click()

        # Step 5: Verify the success page
        # Validate the presence of the specific texts
        await page.locator("h2:has-text('Just a couple of questions to save you time')").wait_for()
        await page.locator("p:has-text('Bedrooms help us find your perfect fit')").wait_for()
        bedroom_options = await page.query_selector_all("div.bedroom-option-card")
        assert len(bedroom_options) == 4, "Expected 4 bedroom option cards"

        await browser.close()

asyncio.run(run())
